C

CancelGame - Class in Gui_View.PopUpWindows
CancelGame create a Pop-Up that is displayed when the user clicks on the red "Exit-Button" of the window: this Pop-Up is displayed in every Scene of the Game and does only ask if the user is sure if he is sure to close the game
CancelGame() - Constructor for class Gui_View.PopUpWindows.CancelGame
 
checkArrayList(ArrayList<Point>, Point) - Method in class KI.Ki
 
checkIfNextToShip(ArrayList<Point>, ArrayList<Point>) - Method in class Model.Playground.OwnPlayground
When a surroundingCoordinates is not next to a ship is sets the ValidPlacementMarker to true
checkIfTacticMakesSense(Point, int) - Method in class KI.Ki
 
checkSurroundingsOfMarkedPositions(Point[]) - Method in class Model.Playground.OwnPlayground
Calculates the surrounding Coordinates of a Point This method calls foreach surrounding coordinate the checkIfNextToShip method

Closes the client or sever socket and the associated writers and readers

closeReaderWriter() - Method in class Network.Communication
This method is called by the closeConnection method in Server.java and Client.java Closes the readers and writers
CMD - Enum in Network
All commands allowed by the communication protocol Inclusive the extended mode commands, these commands are also checked by the cmdChecker in Communication but not implemented, as no one else implemented the enhanced version
CMD() - Constructor for enum Network.CMD
 
Communication - Class in Network
 
Communication() - Constructor for class Network.Communication
 
conFailed - Static variable in class Gui_View.PopUpWindows.ConnectionFailed
 
conLost - Static variable in class Gui_View.PopUpWindows.ConnectionLost
 
connect() - Method in class Controller.MpClientController
User actionEvent call Displays a loading indicator and sets the start button invisible Creates the client and tries to connect to the remote server socket If the client got successfully created, the MultiplayerControlThreadConfigCommunication Thread gets started While the Thread is running an info text is shown The Thread switches the Scene, after all configurations got successfully transmitted
connected - Variable in class Network.Communication
 
connectionFailed() - Static method in class Gui_View.HelpMethods
 
ConnectionFailed - Class in Gui_View.PopUpWindows
ConnectionFailed creates a PopUp that informs the user that it was not possible to establish a connection with the remote partner and lets him choose whether he wants to go back to the Main Menu oder Exit the Game
ConnectionFailed() - Constructor for class Gui_View.PopUpWindows.ConnectionFailed
 
connectionLost() - Static method in class Gui_View.HelpMethods
 
ConnectionLost - Class in Gui_View.PopUpWindows
ConnectionLost creates a PopUp that informs the user that the connection to the remote partner was lost and lets him choose whether he wants to go back to the Main Menu oder Exit the Game
ConnectionLost() - Constructor for class Gui_View.PopUpWindows.ConnectionLost
 
ConnectionStatus() - Constructor for enum Network.Server.ConnectionStatus
 
constructSaveGame() - Static method in class Serialize.SaveAndLoad
